name: Meet Forest, a 14" button-jointed Baby
description:
Forest is a beautiful all-natural 14" button-jointed baby made from clean carded wool and the finest imported cotton. He has tan skin, light brown eyes, warm blushed cheeks, and soft green curly hair made from teeswater locks crochet into a cap and sewn securely onto his head . 

He has limbs that move, a pinch-able lil' bum, sweet little ears, and also a belly button on his round tummy. All of our babies come with a little pink needle-felted heart on the inside of their chests made from 100% wool and love.

His pacifier is magnetic and will stick to his mouth by itself! Forest can sit all by himself and can't wait to play pat-a-cake with you. 

He comes with a green pacifier, acorn hat, matching booties, and 2 diapers. (You may order extra outfits separately.)

*******************

Our babies are born from a pattern designed by the amazing Jenn at Lali Doll. They are NOT recommended for children under 3 or those that still put things in their mouths, as magnets can pose serious risk of injury if swallowed. 

For more pictures please see: www.tansydolls.blogspot.com

And, as always, we can add freckles or even embroidered birthmarks/scars to match your little ones - for FREE! (must provide pictures)

* Please visit us on FB for our most current updates, giveaways, and more!!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/TansyDollsPage

And our blog!
http://tansydolls.blogspot.com/

If you have any questions, please contact Robin, Lesley, and Cady at hello@tansydolls.com. We are happy to help you!

**********************

Every Tansy doll is handmade with care and is unique in its own beauty.

* US shipping is $15, $35 everywhere else. We always combine shipping when ordering multiple products and refund differences if over $3. We'll never make you overpay for shipping! :) We support USPS and ship Priority Mail with tracking.

name: Little Red Riding Hood and Wolfgang!
description:
We want all of our dolls to find homes for the Holidays and so we've reduced all our 10" and 16" sweeties! Originally $200, you save over $65 off. Thanks and Happy Holidays! :)

Little Red Ridinghood is a very special handcrafted 16" Tansy Doll made from the finest wool and imported cotton.

She has blush skin, brown hair made from the finest all-natural mohair and wool yarn, and warm blushed cheeks.

She has a sparkle in her bright blue eyes.

Little Red comes with an extra special package of goodies!

She is wearing an adorable fancy dress made from Riley Blake's 'Simple Life" collection of fabrics as well as a fancy lace white apron that can come on & off. Little Red's riding hood is fastened with a real wooden button and features Aneela Hoey's "Icing Birds" design as the fabric lining.

Little Red also comes ready to play with her best frienemy, Wolfgang - a 10" 100% wool rag doll, hand-stitched with love.

Red also is ready for a trip to Grandmother's House on a moment's notice with her crocheted basket and needle-felted baguette inside!

**************
All Tansy dolls are made with love and special attention to detail by Robin, Lesley, and Cady. Our dolls are made from the finest imported European cotton interlock and tightly stuffed with over a pound of clean wool. Their cute faces are embroidered with love and cotton thread and their cheeks are blushed. Their hair is made from an all-natural mix of wool, mohair, and rayon, with special hand spun and dyed locks.

Every Tansy doll is handmade with care and is unique in its own beauty. Our dolls are loved and come with a sparkle in their eye! Each comes with a special outfit, undies, shoes, and birth certificate.

We are happy to add freckles, embroidered birthmarks, or scars to match your little ones free of charge (you must provide a picture so we can match them)

These dolls are intended for children ages 3 and up.

* US shipping is $25, $45 everywhere else. We always combine shipping when ordering multiple products and refund differences if over $3. We'll never make you overpay for shipping! :) We support USPS and ship with tracking.

**********************
You can view many more pictures of Little Red and Wolfgang on our facebook page:
www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.555561801138714.142064.426109034083992&type=1&ref=notif&notif_t=like

name: Meet Kai, a 10" all-natural friend
description:
We want all of our dolls to find homes for the Holidays and so we've reduced all our 10" and 16" sweeties! Originally $95, you save $30 off. Thanks and Happy Holidays! :)

Kai is a beautifully hand crafted 10" BLOSSOM Tansy Doll made from the finest wool and imported cotton. He has peach skin, thick black hair made with the finest all-natural wool yarn. He has a sparkle in his dark brown eyes and has warm blushed cheeks.

He comes wearing sweet outfit with an Elephant button & white polka-dot undies. Kai has the teeny-tiniest grey boots you ever did see!

name: Custom 14" Jointed Baby Down Payment
description:
**PLEASE NOTE: any custom orders placed after Dec. 1st will be delivered in January 2014**

* the babies pictured here have already sold. This is a listing for a down payment on a custom made-to-order doll especially for you. Our babies cost $160 - $80 is due upon ordering and $80 due before shipping (shipping is an additional charge) Thanks!*

Our babies are born from a pattern designed by the amazing Jenn at Lali Doll. They are 14" button-jointed dolls made from clean carded wool and DWE imported cotton. They have a pinch-able lil' bum, sweet little ears, warm blushed cheeks, and also a belly button on their round tummy. 

Their pacifier is magnetic and will stick to their mouths by itself! Our babies can sit all by themselves and can't wait to play pat-a-cake with you. 

They come with a pacifier, hat, booties, and 2 diapers. (You may order extra outfits separately.)

When ordering a custom, we will send you an order form so that we get every detail exactly as you'd like!

You can decide: hair, eye, and skin color. We can make their eyes opened or closed. We can also add glass beads for a heavier weighted feel.

Hair type: long mohair wefts, 100% wool cap, or brushed mohair (fuzzy newborn hair look). And what outfit theme you'd like! Currently we have: Fox, Sock Monkey, Lion, Bunny, Panda, or Raccoon.

For more pictures please see: www.tansydolls.blogspot.com

And, as always, we can add freckles or even embroidered birthmarks/scars to match your little ones - for FREE! (must provide pictures)

* Please visit us on FB for our most current updates, giveaways, and more!!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/TansyDollsPage

And our blog!
http://tansydolls.blogspot.com/

Please allow just 2-3 weeks after your order has been paid for for your doll to be created and shipped (with tracking.)

If you have any questions, please contact Robin, Lesley, and Cady at hello@tansydolls.com. We are happy to help you!

**********************

Tansy Dolls are made from the finest imported European cotton interlock and tightly stuffed with over a pound of clean carded wool. Their cute faces are embroidered with love and cotton thread and their cheeks are blushed. Their hair is made from an all-natural mix of wool and mohair, with special hand spun and dyed locks.

Every Tansy doll is handmade with care and is unique in its own beauty.

* US shipping is $15, $25 everywhere else. We always combine shipping when ordering multiple products and refund differences if over $3. We'll never make you overpay for shipping! :) We support USPS and ship Priority Mail with tracking.

name: Meet Hortense! A needle-felted Dragon critter
description:
Hortense is an all-natural, hand crafted Dragon made from the finest 100% wool. She has a light blue body with fierce pink wings and is approximately 3" long.

She comes with her very own little birth certificate.

She is delicate and makes a wonderful addition to a festive table or as a friend to a child who plays gently with their treasures.

**********************

All Tansy Dolls are made with love and special attention to detail by Robin, Lesley, and Cady.  They are one-of-a-kind, handmade with care and unique in their own beauty. 

All Tansy Dolls are intended for children ages 3 and up.

* Priority US shipping w/tracking is $6, $8 first class everywhere else. We always combine shipping when ordering multiple products and refund differences if over $3. We'll never make you overpay for shipping! :) We support USPS and ship with tracking.

name: Meet Viola Rose, a 14" Button-jointed Baby
description:
Viola Rose is a beautiful all-natural 14" button-jointed baby made from clean carded wool and the finest imported cotton. She has warm brown skin, sleepy eyes, warm blushed cheeks, and soft black hair made from 100% mohair and sewn into a secure cap. 

She has limbs that move, a pinch-able lil' bum, sweet little ears, and also a belly button on her round tummy. 

Her pacifier is magnetic and will stick to her mouth by itself! Viola Rose can sit all by herself and can't wait to play pat-a-cake with you. 

She comes with a yellow pacifier, sock monkey hat, matching booties, and 2 diapers. (You may order extra outfits separately.)

name: Meet Nixie the Mermaid, a 16" all-natural friend
description:
We want all of our dolls to find homes for the Holidays and so we've reduced all our 10" and 16" sweeties! Originally $200, you save over $65 off. Thanks and Happy Holidays! :)

Nixie the Little Mermaid, is a very special handcrafted 16" Tansy Doll.
She is made from the finest wool and DWE imported cotton. Nixie has blush skin, warm blushed cheeks, and a sparkle in her bright sea-green eyes.

She has over 2 feet of gorgeous curly hair made from the finest all-natural mohair and 100% wool yarn. Her beautiful mane is blond with a rainbow of colors cascading down her back.

She is wearing an adorable Mermaiden Tail with pastel rainbow yarn and sparkly blue 'scales' that was crochet with lots of time and love by Cady. She also comes with a shimmery shell necklace from treasures that she found while swimming in her ocean home

When Nixie is ready to party, she changes out of her tail and into her sweet teal Coral Ball Gown made with silk by Robin. This OOAK dress was hand-embellished by Cady into a shimmery coral design with beautiful beadwork. Nixie also comes with silvery crochet shoes and the cutest little undies you ever did see.

To see more pictures of Nixie, please visit our blog: www.tansydolls.blogspot.com

**************
All Tansy dolls are made with love and special attention to detail by Robin, Lesley, and Cady. Our dolls are made from the finest imported European cotton interlock and tightly stuffed with over a pound of clean wool. Their cute faces are embroidered with love and cotton thread and their cheeks are blushed. Their hair is made from an all-natural mix of wool, mohair, and rayon, with special hand spun and dyed locks.

Every Tansy doll is handmade with care and is unique in its own beauty. Our dolls are loved and come with a sparkle in their eye! Each comes with a special outfit, undies, shoes, and birth certificate.

name: Meet Pear Blossom, a 16" Korean Princess Doll!
description:
We want all of our dolls to find homes for the Holidays and so we've reduced all our 10" and 16" sweeties! Originally $200, you save over $65 off. Thanks and Happy Holidays! :)

Pear Blossom the Korean Princess is a very special handcrafted 16" Tansy Doll made from the finest clean carded wool and imported cotton. She was inspired by the story "Pearblossom, " a Cinderella story that takes place in Korea hundreds of years ago.

She has peach skin, blushed cheeks, and black hair with hand-spun blue highlights made from the finest all-natural mohair and wool yarn.

She has a sparkle in her dark brown eyes.

Pear Blossom is a special edition Tansy Doll from our "From Fables" series. You can read about her story on our blog:
www.tansydolls.blogspot.com

She comes with an extra special package of goodies!

She is wearing a beautiful pink and green 'princess' hanbok made from silk dupioni and has pretty pink felt blossom hairclips in her hair. She has hand-stitched pink boots with blossom buttons on their sides.

Her little goblin friend in a kimchi jar is a Tokgabi, a gracious goblin that helps her on her way. He is needle-felted from 100% wool and his jar is crochet with love.

You can read about the story of Pear Blossom here:
http://tribeteacher.wordpress.com/2010/05/10/the-korean%C2%A0cinderella/

**************

description:
Meet Evergreen! Evergreen is a 5" Tansy Doll Elf friend with peach skin and bright green eyes. He has a soft red minky body, a cute green scarf, and a matching elf cap. The scarf is removable (the hat is not). He has warm cheeks, blushed with beeswax. He is handmade with love from imported cotton and stuffed with clean earth-friendly wool.

name: Meet Poppy, a 5" all-natural ELF friend
description:
Meet Poppy! Poppy is a 5" Tansy Doll Elf friend with peach skin and bright blue eyes. She has a soft red minky body, a cute white scarf, and a matching elf cap with red hair pokin' out. The scarf is removable (the hat is not). Poppy has warm cheeks, blushed with beeswax. She is handmade with love from imported cotton and stuffed with clean earth-friendly wool.

**********************

name: Meet FireWing, a needle-felted Dragon critter
description:
Firewing is an all-natural, hand crafted Dragon made from the finest 100% wool. She has a light green body with orange and forest green wings and is approximately 3" long. Firewing has scales that go down her back and tail.

She comes with her very own little birth certificate.

She is delicate and makes a wonderful addition to a festive table or as a friend to a child who plays gently with their treasures.

**********************

All Tansy Dolls are made with love and special attention to detail by Robin, Lesley, and Cady.  They are one-of-a-kind, handmade with care and unique in their own beauty. 

All Tansy Dolls are intended for children ages 3 and up.

name: Andy the Griffin
description:
Andy the Griffin is an all-natural, hand crafted critter made from the finest 100% wool. This legendary creature has the head and wings of an Eagle and the body and tail of a Lion and is approximately 5" long. 

He comes with her very own little birth certificate.

Andy is delicate and makes a wonderful addition to a festive table or as a friend to a child who plays gently with their treasures.
